item.description:
Community Works presents Share a Laugh, its 6th annual fundraiser hosted by comedian extraordinaire Wendy Liebman and joined by friends John Fugelsang, Jimmy Tingle, Chris Tabb, Kelly MacFarland, Bethany Van Delft on Thursday, May 16, 2013 at the Somerville Theatre.

 

Tickets are now on sale through the event web page. $30 for general audience available online, and $8 discount tickets available for students with college ID at the show.

Please get your tickets in advance.  Whining to me that tickets are sold out will not be tolerated.

 

 

Jimmy Tingle
Jimmy Tingle is an actor. He has appeared in 6 films and television shows. He was first cast as the character 'Lowrey the Bartender' in 'Next Stop Wonderland' in the year 1998.

 

Bethany Van Delft
Bethany Van Delft can be seen in Comedy Central’s Funaticos in early 2010. She is a regular feature in the Boston Comedy Festival, New York Underground Comedy Festival, and The Greater Boston Alternative Comedy Festival....

 

John Fugelsang
Parents are a former nun and a former Franciscan monk. First role was the Scarecrow in his elementary school's production of The Wizard of Oz. Made professional acting debut at 12 as the Second Player in a regional theater production of Hamlet ....

 

Wendy Liebman
Wendy Liebman -- whose first one-hour special Taller on TV is now airing on Showtime -- is known for her unique and clever twists on the classic one-liner style. Voted Best Female Comedian by the American Comedy Awards in 1996, she's headlined clubs across the country for more than 20 years, and has made dozens of TV appearances, including multiple visits to the Carson, Fallon, Letterman, Kimmel, Ferguson and Leno and many more....

 

Kelly MacFarland
Kelly MacFarland has opened for Melissa Etheridge, LeAnn Rimes and for the international craze, Puppetry of the Penis. You may also recognize her from season one of NBC's The Biggest Loser or from Boston's 2006 First Night celebration.
item.name: Share a Laugh - Comedy Fundraiser at the Somerville Theater
